name: UnofficialDailyHockeyNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Simple brief from Alexa on top hockey updates of the day. (Alexa does have some issues with player names)
Go to settings to choose what news sources you want Alexa to incorporate. 

Will be adding individual teams later on.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
